title: 11. How can Ebola be prevented?
content:
- Avoid contact with body fluids from any person suspected to be suffering from Ebola.
 - Persons who have died of Ebola must be buried immediately by trained people.
 - Do not handle the body of a person who has died of Ebola.
 - In case you accidently come in contact with a person suspected to have Ebola, wash your hands
thoroughly with soap and water.
 - Use gloves when handling Ebola suspected or confirmed cases.
